main event: A bright light was observed in Washington, D.C. on June 15, 1954, which moved up, down, and then remained steady.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 15 minutes.,The object was reported to have the brightness of a star.,The object appeared to reflect light from a ground illuminator.,There was insufficient information to determine the nature of the object.,It was recorded as part of the systematic study of UFOs known as Project Blue Book.
sighted object: a bright light resembling a lit satellite
